description: Avi is so cute (The Doll) she had no idea what was in store for her. We put her with Janay (Ice). The Doll started with fire but soon Ice put her out and down. Ice put her in many submission holds, even the vaunted BACKBREAKER of DEATH. Ice sexually humiliates the Doll totally. In the end the Doll was Ice's sex toy on the mat.
title: The Doll vs Ice
